mapper.insert: insert into place(contentId, title, areaCode, image1,image2, address, mapx, mapy, contents, viewcount, writingtime) values(#{contentId},#{title},#{areaCode}, #{image1},0,#{address}, #{mapx}, #{mapy},"null",0,now());
mapper.select: select count(*) from place where areaCode=#{areaCode};
